query.mssql: update {0} set DocumentInfo = docs.Name from (select task.id Task, docs.Name Name from {0} task join Sungero_WF_Attachment attachment on task.Id = attachment.Task join Sungero_Content_EDoc docs on attachment.AttachmentId = docs.Id where attachment.[Group] = '804f50fe-f3da-411b-bb2e-e5373936e029') docs where id = docs.Task and ReportSessionId = '{1}'
query.postgres: update {0} set DocumentInfo = docs.Name from (select task.id Task, docs.Name from {0} task join Sungero_WF_Attachment attachment on task.Id = attachment.Task join Sungero_Content_EDoc docs on attachment.AttachmentId = docs.Id where attachment.Group = '804f50fe-f3da-411b-bb2e-e5373936e029') docs where id = docs.Task and ReportSessionId = '{1}'

query.default: select * from Micros_Meetings_Report temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by RowIndex

query.mssql: create table {0} ([RowIndex] int NOT NULL, [Id] int NOT NULL, [Hyperlink] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [ActionItemText] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [Author] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [State] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [PlanDate] nvarchar(max), [PlanDateSort] nvarchar(max), [ActualDate] nvarchar(max), [Overdue] nvarchar(max), [Assignee] nvarchar(max), [CoAssignees] nvarchar(max), [DocumentInfo] nvarchar(max), [MeetingId] int, [MeetingName] nvarchar(max), [ReportSessionId] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [Texts] nvarchar(max))
query.postgres: create table {0} (RowIndex int NOT NULL, Id int NOT NULL, Hyperlink citext NOT NULL, ActionItemText citext NOT NULL, Author citext NOT NULL, State citext NOT NULL, PlanDate citext, PlanDateSort timestamp, ActualDate citext, Overdue int, Assignee citext, CoAssignees citext, DocumentInfo citext, MeetingId int, MeetingName citext, ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL, Texts citext)

query.mssql: update Micros_Meetings_Report rep set meetingname = docs.meetingName, meetingid = docs.meetingId from (select task.Id as TaskId, meeting.DisplayName as meetingName, docs.MinutesMeeting_Meeting_Sungero as meetingId from Micros_Meetings_Report task, Sungero_WF_Attachment attachment, Sungero_Content_EDoc docs, Sungero_Meeting_Meeting meeting where attachment.[Group] = '804f50fe-f3da-411b-bb2e-e5373936e029' and task.Id = attachment.Task and attachment.AttachmentId = docs.Id and docs.MinutesMeeting_Meeting_Sungero = meeting.Id) docs where rep.id = docs.TaskId
query.postgres: update Micros_Meetings_Report rep set meetingname = docs.meetingName, meetingid = docs.meetingId from (select task.Id as TaskId, meeting.DisplayName as meetingName, docs.MinutesMeeting_Meeting_Sungero as meetingId from Micros_Meetings_Report task, Sungero_WF_Attachment attachment, Sungero_Content_EDoc docs, Sungero_Meeting_Meeting meeting where attachment.Group = '804f50fe-f3da-411b-bb2e-e5373936e029' and task.Id = attachment.Task and attachment.AttachmentId = docs.Id and docs.MinutesMeeting_Meeting_Sungero = meeting.Id) docs where rep.id = docs.TaskId
